description: AIM XRK telemetry analysis with shift point, lap, and transmission comparison features

features.name: Fix gear_calculator imports
features.description: Change import from non-existent config_analysis to vehicle_config
features.notes: Fixed: import from vehicle_config instead of config_analysis

features.name: Session builder Parquet export
features.description: Extract all channels from XRK and export to Parquet with proper interpolation
features.notes: Fixed: np.interp instead of pandas reindex for time alignment

features.name: Config path fix
features.description: Data directory points to PROJECT_ROOT/data not src/config/data
features.notes: Fixed: Config class uses PROJECT_ROOT for data paths

features.name: Parquet data viewer
features.description: Web UI to browse extracted Parquet files with channel stats and pagination
features.notes: Available at /parquet endpoint

features.name: Cross-machine workflow
features.description: .memory folder for Linux/Windows communication via git
features.notes: Push/pull workflow for cross-machine development

features.name: XRK extraction queue
features.description: Job queue for Windows extraction service with pending/processing/completed states and retry logic
features.notes: SQLite-backed queue with 26 passing tests. Thread-safe, persistent, supports priority and retry.

features.name: Windows extraction API
features.description: FastAPI service on Windows that processes XRK files via DLL and returns Parquet
features.notes: FastAPI service with /extract, /download, /health endpoints. 14 tests passing.

features.name: Queue worker with retry
features.description: Background worker that polls queue, calls Windows API, handles failures with backoff
features.notes: ExtractionWorker with exponential backoff, health checks, graceful shutdown. 20 tests passing.

features.name: Shift point analysis
features.description: Detect shift points, calculate shift RPM by gear, identify early/late shifts
features.notes: ShiftAnalyzer with quality assessment, recommendations, JSON export. 22 tests passing.

features.name: Transmission comparison
features.description: Compare current vs proposed transmission setups using real session data
features.notes: TransmissionComparison with gear overlap analysis, session-based RPM comparison. 24 tests passing.

features.name: Lap detection and analysis
features.description: GPS-based lap detection, fastest lap identification, per-lap statistics
features.notes: Wraps lap_analyzer module, supports Road America GPS coordinates. 17 tests passing.

features.name: Gear usage analysis
features.description: Time spent in each gear, gear usage by track section, optimal gear recommendations
features.notes: GearAnalysis with usage stats, track sections, recommendations. 24 tests passing.

features.name: Acceleration and power analysis
features.description: Calculate acceleration from speed data, estimate power output, braking analysis
features.notes: PowerAnalysis with physics-based P=mav, event detection, recommendations. 26 tests passing.

features.name: Session report generator
features.description: Full session report combining laps, shifts, gear usage, and recommendations
features.notes: SessionReportGenerator combining all analyses with JSON/HTML output. 23 tests passing.

features.name: Track map visualization
features.description: GPS trace visualization color-coded by speed, gear, or RPM
features.notes: TrackMap with SVG/HTML output, color scales, legend. 35 tests passing.

features.name: Analysis API endpoints
features.description: REST endpoints: /api/analyze/shifts, /api/analyze/laps, /api/analyze/report
features.notes: 6 analysis endpoints: shifts, laps, gears, power, report, track-map. 13 tests passing.

features.name: Analysis results viewer
features.description: Web page to view analysis results with charts and tables
features.notes: Interactive display with Chart.js charts for shifts, laps, gears, power. 18 tests passing.

features.name: Queue status dashboard
features.description: View extraction queue status, retry failed jobs, see processing history
features.notes: Stats cards, job list with filters, retry/delete actions, auto-refresh. 24 tests passing.

features.name: Track database
features.description: Multi-track support with GPS coordinates for start/finish and corners
features.notes: Currently hardcoded for Road America, expand to Watkins Glen etc.

features.name: Vehicle profiles
features.description: Multiple vehicle configurations with different tire sizes, gear ratios, weights
features.notes: Currently single vehicle in vehicle_config.py

features.name: Test coverage for core modules
features.description: Unit tests for gear_calculator, lap_analyzer, session_builder
features.notes: Improve test coverage before adding new features

features.name: Integration tests with real data
features.description: End-to-end tests using actual Parquet files from Road America sessions
features.notes: Uses data/exports/processed/*.parquet as fixtures
